summary: Add integrated 3D intro scene mechanics: cows drift smoothly across screen without colliding; UFOs dart through and physically push cows, triggering realistic cow reactions every ~3 seconds; add high-contrast white spotlights from the front/bottom of UFOs aimed at cows, maintaining existing game theme/scene.
architectural_notes: Integrate new intro mechanics into the existing scene without altering previously completed content/theme.

existing_features.title: Update the existing intro/hero 3D scene so that all cows drift smoothly across the screen in continuous motion and never collide with (or overlap) each other, while preserving the current scene/theme and overall look.

Implement UFO-to-cow interactions in the existing intro/hero 3D scene so that UFOs are the only objects that can ‘collide’ with cows: UFOs dart through quickly and physically push cows into new directions with a realistic-feeling impulse response, without enabling cow-vs-cow collisions.

Add periodic ‘cow reaction’ behavior to the intro/hero 3D scene approximately every 3 seconds (per cow or globally, but consistently timed), visible as secondary animation/pose response to the ongoing motion and/or recent UFO pushes.

Enhance UFO lighting in the intro/hero 3D scene by adding high-contrast white lights positioned at the front and underside of each UFO, oriented toward nearby cows, and ensure the lighting reads as high-quality 3D (clean contrast against the UFO body) without changing the existing game theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Cows fly smoothly across the screen without touching each other (integrated into existing intro scene).
UFOs pass quickly and are the only objects that collide with cows, pushing them to a new direction with realistic physics.
Add periodic realistic cow reactions/animations approximately every 3 seconds.
Add white lights on the front and underside of UFOs aimed at cows with strong contrast and high-quality 3D look, without changing the game theme.

projectName: Integrate smooth flying cows, UFO push interactions, and UFO spotlights into existing 3D intro scene
